name: subatic
description: Subatic is a self-hosted platform for managing anime and media subscriptions, tracking episodes, and organizing watchlists in a simple dashboard.
features: Anime tracking: Monitors anime series and episodes for watching.
Subscription management: Tracks which streaming services have specific shows.
Watchlist: Creates lists of anime to watch with priority ordering.
Episode tracking: Marks episodes as watched and tracks progress.
Release calendar: Shows upcoming episode releases for followed series.
Search functionality: Finds anime by title, genre, or studio.
Recommendation engine: Suggests similar anime based on preferences.
Status tracking: Marks series as watching, completed, or plan to watch.
Rating system: Rates completed series for personal reference.
Statistics: Displays watch time and completion statistics.
Export data: Downloads watchlist and history for backup.
Mobile friendly: Manages anime tracking from any device.
